component.name: Apache Sling Scripting Bundle Tracker
component.description:
The Apache Sling Scripting Bundle Tracker bundle represents an add-on module that can be deployed on a Sling 10 instance or
        newer to enhance the scripting resolving capabilities. Being an add-on, the bundle hooks into Sling's current mechanisms for
        content-to-servlet resolution and essentially acts as a service registration broker for bundles providing scripting capabilities

component.name: Apache Sling Scripting Core
component.description: Sling Scripting core functionality

component.name: Apache Sling Scripting ESX
component.description: Support NodeJS like scripting and module resolution

component.name: Apache Sling Scripting HTL Compiler
component.description:
The Apache Sling Scripting HTL Compiler provides support for compiling HTML Template Language scripts into an Abstract
        Syntax Tree.

component.name: Apache Sling Scripting HTL Engine
component.description:
The Apache Sling Scripting HTL Engine is a Java implementation of the HTML Template Language specification. The bundle contains the
        HTL script engine and its runtime implementation.

component.name: Apache Sling Scripting HTL Java Compiler
component.description:
The Apache Sling Scripting HTL Java Compiler provides support for transpiling the Abstract Syntax Tree produced by the
        org.apache.sling.scripting.sightly.compiler module into Java source code.

component.name: Apache Sling Scripting HTL JS Use Provider
component.description: The Apache Sling HTL JavaScript Use Provider adds support for accessing JS scripts from HTL's Use-API.

component.name: Apache Sling Scripting Java Support
component.description: Support for scripting Java

component.name: Apache Sling Scripting JavaScript
component.description: Support for JavaScript scripting

component.name: Apache Sling Scripting JSP
component.description: Support for JSP scripting

component.name: Apache Sling Commons HTML Utilities
component.description: The Sling Commons HTML bundle provides utility classes for parsing and creating HTML.

component.name: Apache Sling Hypermedia API tools
component.description: Sling tools for adding support for defining, maintaining and consuming a Hypermedia API in sling components

component.name: Apache Sling I18N Support
component.description: Support for creating Java I18N ResourceBundles from repository resources.

component.name: Apache Sling Initial Content Loader
component.description: This bundle provides initial content installation through bundles.

component.name: Apache Sling Installer Core
component.description:
Provides services to install OSGi bundles and configurations
        by supplying input streams and dictionaries.

component.name: Apache Sling Jackrabbit JSR-283 Access Control Manager Support
component.description: Provides SlingPostOperations for the Jackrabbit JSR-283 Access Control Manager.

component.name: Apache Sling Jackrabbit UserManager Support
component.description:
Provides ResourceProvider and SlingPostOperations for the Jackrabbit
        UserManager.

component.name: Apache Sling JCR Base Bundle
component.description: The JCR base bundle provides JCR utility classes

component.name: Apache Sling JCR ClassLoader
component.description:
This bundle provides a classloader for the Apache Sling Commons
        dynamic classloader. The classloader provided supports loading
        classes from a JCR repository at configured paths. This bundle
        also implements a class writer which allows to store compiled
        classes (like compiled JSPs etc.) in the repository.

component.name: Apache Sling JCR Installer
component.description: Installs OSGi bundles and configurations found in the JCR repository.

component.name: Apache Sling JCR Resource
component.description: This bundle provides the JCR based ResourceProvider.

component.name: Apache ServiceComb Pack
component.description: Eventual consistency component for distributed systems

component.name: Apache Commons Numbers
component.description: The Apache Commons Numbers project provides number types and utilities.

component.name: Apache Commons RNG
component.description: The Apache Commons RNG project provides pure-Java implementation of pseudo-random generators.

component.name: Apache Commons Statistics
component.description: The Apache Commons Statistics project provides tools for statistics.

component.name: Apache CXF
component.description:
Apache CXF is an open-source services framework that aids in 
    the development of services using front-end programming APIs, like JAX-WS 
    and JAX-RS.

component.name: Apache Sling Parent Reactor
component.description: The reactor pom to build all Sling parents

component.name: Apache Sling Pipes
component.description: bulk content changes tool

component.name: Apache Sling Provisioning Model
component.description: The provisioning model for Apache Sling

component.name: Apache Sling Query
component.description: jQuery-inspired repository traversal tool for Sling

component.name: Apache Sling Resource Filter
component.description: provides a set of utilities to create and handle streams

component.name: Apache Sling Resource Merger
component.description: This bundle provides services to merge resources.

component.name: Apache Sling Resource Resolver
component.description: This bundle provides the Resource Resolver and the Resource Resolver Factory.

component.name: Apache Sling Resource-Based Discovery Service
component.description: Implementation of Apache Sling Discovery based on Sling Resource providing a ClusterView through resource-clustering (eg jackrabbit clustering) and a TopologyView through HTTP POST heartbeats announcing sub-topologies to each other.

component.name: Apache Sling Rewriter
component.description:
The Apache Sling Rewriter allows configurable post processing of any output
        from Apache Sling. The output can be processed by a configurable processor
        or a configurable pipeline.

component.name: Apache Hadoop Ozone Main
component.description: Apache Hadoop Ozone Main

component.name: Apache IoTDB (incubating) Project Parent POM
component.description: This is the top level project that builds, packages the tsfile, iotdb engine, jdbc, and integration libs.

component.name: Apache Isis (Aggregator)
component.description:
Convenience aggregator POM that references all modules.
        The parent POM of the core framework is core-parent/pom.xml

component.name: Apache Tamaya Base
component.description: Apache Tamaya - Java Configuration

component.name: Apache Tamaya Extensions
component.description: Extension modules for Apache Tamaya

component.name: Apache Sling JUnit Tests Teleporter
component.description: Client-side implementation of the Teleporter mechanism for server-side JUnit tests

component.name: Apache Sling XSS Protection API
component.description: Apache Sling XSS Protection Bundle providing XSS protection based on the OWASP AntiSamy and OWASP Java Encoder libraries.

component.name: Apache Sling - CMS
component.description: An Apache Sling Reference CMS Application

Initializes a JCR repository based on the output

component.description: Runs JUnit tests in an OSGi framework and provides the JUnit libraries

component.name: Apache Sling Feature Model Converter
component.description: A feature describes an OSGi system

component.name: Apache Sling File Optimization
component.description: Bundle for optimizing files stored in the Apache Sling repository. Includes a plugin architecture for providing file optimizers and hooks to automatically and manually optimize files.

component.name: Apache Sling File System Resource Provider
component.description: Provides a ResourceProvider implementation supporting file system based resources.

component.name: Apache Sling Form Based Authentication
component.description:
Bundle implementing form based authentication with login
        and logout support. Authentication state is maintained in
        a Cookie or in an HTTP Session. The password is only submitted
        when first authenticating.

component.name: Openmeetings
component.description: Parent project for all OpenMeetings Maven modules. Required to hold general settings

component.name: Apache JSPWiki
component.description:
Apache JSPWiki is a leading open source WikiWiki engine, feature-rich
    and built around standard JEE components (Java, servlets, JSP).

component.name: Apache Sling Jobs Support
component.description: Support for Job processing using message passing..

component.name: Apache Sling Launchpad Base
component.description:
This module contains the common classes and configuration files used
        by the various launchpad modules..

component.name: Apache Sling Launchpad Integration Tests
component.description:
Sling Integration Tests, contains integration tests that
        are used by the testing project and other upstream testing projects.

component.name: Apache Sling Launchpad Testing Services
component.description: Sling services used by the Launchpad Testing integration tests

component.name: Apache Sling Log Tracer
component.description:
Tracer provides support for enabling the logs for specific category at specific level and
    only for specific request. It provides a very fine level of control via config provided
    as part of HTTP request around how the logging should be performed for given category.

    Refer to http://sling.apache.org/documentation/bundles/log-tracers.html

component.name: Apache Sling Maven Launchpad Plugin
component.description: Maven Plugin supporting Sling Launchpad

component.name: Apache Sling Maven Plugin Reactor
component.description: The parent project for Apache Sling

component.name: Apache Sling Models Implementation
component.description: Apache Sling Models Implementation

component.name: Apache Sling Models Integration Tests
component.description:
Apache Sling Models Integration Tests - builds a bundle
        with Sling server-side tests, and executes them via a
        remote test proxy that runs in the integration-tests phase.

component.name: Apache Sling API
component.description:
The Apache Sling API defines an extension to the Servlet
        API 2.4 to provide access to content and unified access
        to request parameters hiding the differences between the
        different methods of transferring parameters from client
        to server. Note that the Apache Sling API bundle does not
        include the Servlet API but instead requires the API to
        be provided by the Servlet container in which the Apache
        Sling framework is running or by another bundle.

component.name: Apache Sling Auth Core
component.description:
The Sling Authentication Service bundle provides the basic
        mechanisms to authenticate HTTP requests with a JCR repository.
        The algorithms for extracting authentication details from the
        requests is extensible by implementing an AuthenticationHandler
        interface.

component.name: Apache Sling Bundle Resource Provider
component.description:
Provides a ResourceProvider implementation supporting bundle
        based resources.

component.name: Apache Sling Clam
component.description: Support for scanning Sling's repository data with Clam service

component.name: Apache Sling Committer CLI
component.description:
Apache Sling Committer CLI provides a Docker image with which useful pre- and post-release steps for Apache
        Sling can be executed.

component.name: Apache Sling Commons JCR File
component.description: NIO.2 file system implementation for JCR

component.name: Apache Sling Commons Log
component.description:
This bundle embeds Logback which provides the SLF4J logging API.
    The embedding supports dynamic OSGi-configuration without
    requiring to edit some global filesystem based XML file.

component.name: Apache Sling Commons Metrics
component.description:
Integrates Metric library with Sling. Refer to
    https://sling.apache.org/documentation/bundles/metrics.html
    for details

component.name: Apache Commons Compress
component.description:
Apache Commons Compress software defines an API for working with
compression and archive formats.  These include: bzip2, gzip, pack200,
lzma, xz, Snappy, traditional Unix Compress, DEFLATE, DEFLATE64, LZ4,
Brotli, Zstandard and ar, cpio, jar, tar, zip, dump, 7z, arj.

component.name: dolphinscheduler
component.description:
Dolphin Scheduler is a distributed and easy-to-expand visual DAG workflow scheduling system, dedicated
        to solving the complex dependencies in data processing, making the scheduling system out of the box for data
        processing.

component.description: IO functionality for the Feature Model

component.name: Apache ServiceComb Toolkit
component.description:
The Apache Software Foundation provides support for the Apache community of open-source software projects.
    The Apache projects are characterized by a collaborative, consensus based development process, an open and
    pragmatic software license, and a desire to create high quality software that leads the way in its field.
    We consider ourselves not simply a group of projects sharing a server, but rather a community of developers
    and users.

component.description:
Provides default GET servlets for HTML, Text and JSON rendering

PLC4X is an effort to create a universal library for accessing industrial programmable logic controllers

component.name: Apache Sling Scripting Bundle Maven Plugin
component.description:
The Apache Sling Scripting Bundle Maven Plugin provides support for packing server-side scripts as bundle
